featured.text: For example, in a wedding banquet it is common to see a pair of ice-sculpted swans that represent the union of the new couple. 49.
When night falls over the Red Sea, tiny flashlight fish rise to the surface for food, each with a pair of “headlamps,” one beneath each eye.
Interestingly, both of them 16 buying the same pair of jeans.

definition.zh_def: 一對相互關聯或相互配合的物品或人。
definition.en_def: A set of two things that are used together or regarded as a unit.
definition.example: She bought a new pair of shoes for the party.
